title: Technical Excellence
description: Our team brings deep subject matter expertise and hands-on experience in artificial intelligence, cloud computing, and quantum technologies

title: Execution
description: As a firm, we prioritize urgency and execution. We have a bias for action and often operate at a faster pace than the startups that we invest in

title: Integrity
description: We have uncompromising integrity, operate with full transparency, and build trust through consistency, hard work, and execution

title: Teamwork
description: We don’t pretend to know what we don’t know. We leverage a world-class network of sellers, engineers, and executives to help create exceptional outcomes

title: Discipline
description: We believe slow-is-smooth and smooth-is-fast. We exercise rigid discipline and consistent daily execution as we pursue outsized returns for our clients
